body_html:
oddly, copying NCCL-SLA.txt didn't work for me:

ERROR: /home/mike/Downloads/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:166:1: //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package: missing input file '@local_config_nccl//:nccl/NCCL-SLA.txt'
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
ERROR: /home/mike/Downloads/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:166:1 1 input file(s) do not exist

but it's there...

[mike@monster nccl]$ pwd
/home/mike/Downloads/tensorflow/third_party/nccl   
[mike@monster nccl]$ ls -la    
total 76  
drwxr-xr-x  2 mike mike  4096 Jun 14 09:41 .  
drwxr-xr-x 25 mike mike  4096 Jun 14 09:38 ..  
-rw-r--r--  1 mike mike 11416 Jun 14 09:02 LICENSE  
-rw-r--r--  1 mike mike  1733 Jun 14 09:02 nccl_archive.BUILD  
-rw-r--r--  1 mike mike  5142 Jun 14 09:02 nccl_configure.bzl  
-rw-rw-rw-  1 mike mike 41927 Jun 14 09:41 NCCL-SLA.txt

body:
oddly, copying NCCL-SLA.txt didn't work for me:

```
ERROR: /home/mike/Downloads/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:166:1: //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package: missing input file '@local_config_nccl//:nccl/NCCL-SLA.txt'
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
ERROR: /home/mike/Downloads/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:166:1 1 input file(s) do not exist
```

but it's there...

```
[mike@monster nccl]$ pwd
/home/mike/Downloads/tensorflow/third_party/nccl   
[mike@monster nccl]$ ls -la    
total 76  
drwxr-xr-x  2 mike mike  4096 Jun 14 09:41 .  
drwxr-xr-x 25 mike mike  4096 Jun 14 09:38 ..  
-rw-r--r--  1 mike mike 11416 Jun 14 09:02 LICENSE  
-rw-r--r--  1 mike mike  1733 Jun 14 09:02 nccl_archive.BUILD  
-rw-r--r--  1 mike mike  5142 Jun 14 09:02 nccl_configure.bzl  
-rw-rw-rw-  1 mike mike 41927 Jun 14 09:41 NCCL-SLA.txt  
```
